USB 랜카드를 여러개 사서 꼽았다 빼거나, VM을 복제한 후 NIC의 MAC을 변경하면, 아래와 같이 NIC의 이름이 밀려있는 경우가 있다.

```
$ ifconfig | grep -i HWaddr
eth0      Link encap:Ethernet  HWaddr b8:ca:3a:cc:01:83
eth1      Link encap:Ethernet  HWaddr 00:60:6e:00:01:6a
eth3      Link encap:Ethernet  HWaddr 00:00:00:00:06:24
vboxnet0  Link encap:Ethernet  HWaddr 0a:00:27:00:00:00
```

`/etc/udev/rules.d/70-persistent-net.rules`을 알맞게 변경하고 재부팅 하면 원하는 대로 되어있다.
```
# This file was automatically generated by the /lib/udev/write_net_rules
# program, run by the persistent-net-generator.rules rules file.
#
# You can modify it, as long as you keep each rule on a single
# line, and change only the value of the NAME= key.

# PCI device 0x8086:0x1502 (e1000e)
SUBSYSTEM=="net", ACTION=="add", DRIVERS=="?*", ATTR{address}=="b8:ca:3a:cc:01:83", ATTR{dev_id}=="0x0", ATTR{type}=="1", KERNEL=="eth*", NAME="eth0"

# PCI device 0x8086:0x422b (iwlwifi)
SUBSYSTEM=="net", ACTION=="add", DRIVERS=="?*", ATTR{address}=="3c:a9:f4:44:c8:74", ATTR{dev_id}=="0x0", ATTR{type}=="1", KERNEL=="wlan*", NAME="wlan0"

# USB device 0x:0x (MOSCHIP usb-ethernet driver)
SUBSYSTEM=="net", ACTION=="add", DRIVERS=="?*", ATTR{address}=="00:60:6e:00:01:6a", ATTR{dev_id}=="0x0", ATTR{type}=="1", KERNEL=="eth*", NAME="eth1"

# USB device 0x:0x (MOSCHIP usb-ethernet driver)
SUBSYSTEM=="net", ACTION=="add", DRIVERS=="?*", ATTR{address}=="00:60:6e:00:00:78", ATTR{dev_id}=="0x0", ATTR{type}=="1", KERNEL=="eth*", NAME="eth2"

# USB device 0x:0x (asix)
SUBSYSTEM=="net", ACTION=="add", DRIVERS=="?*", ATTR{address}=="00:00:00:00:06:24", ATTR{dev_id}=="0x0", ATTR{type}=="1", KERNEL=="eth*", NAME="eth3"

# USB device 0x:0x (asix)
SUBSYSTEM=="net", ACTION=="add", DRIVERS=="?*", ATTR{address}=="00:00:00:00:2c:05", ATTR{dev_id}=="0x0", ATTR{type}=="1", KERNEL=="eth*", NAME="eth4"

# USB device 0x:0x (asix)
SUBSYSTEM=="net", ACTION=="add", DRIVERS=="?*", ATTR{address}=="00:00:00:00:28:67", ATTR{dev_id}=="0x0", ATTR{type}=="1", KERNEL=="eth*", NAME="eth5"
```

(APPENDIX) REFERENCES
UbuntuNicNameChange
http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=2185051
